messages.title: Why we’re all backing the LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
content: I’ve worked in the green industry for 20 years now and it’s clear to me the Liberal Democrats have the best plan to tackle the climate emergency. We can’t afford to wait any longer and I trust Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats to bring about the change we all so desperately need. - Katie Critchlow, Green Business Strategist

I’m backing the Liberal Democrats because they’ve led the fight for mental health provision in our NHS. It’s easy to talk about mental health but our mental health system is still too often unfairly neglected, and that has to change. The Liberal Democrats will invest in mental health services, ensuring mental health is treated with the same urgency as physical health. - Mohsin Khan, Psychiatrist

It wasn’t an easy decision to make but I could no longer campaign for the Party. The Lib Dems are a proudly internationalist party and are the only pro-business party left. - Gabriel Rozenberg, former Conservative councillor in Barnet

I firmly believe that Britain is better off in the EU. As a result I have now found a new home with the Liberal Democrats. I was proud to join a progressive party. I left Labour as a direct consequence of the direction in which the party is moving. - Fiona Dryburgh, former Labour councillor

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START IN LIFE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

The Liberal Democrats will invest in mental health services, ensuring mental health is treated with the same urgency as physical health. - Mohsin Khan, Psychiatrist
